dcterms:creator: Stanislaw Antol
Aishwarya Agrawal
Jiasen Lu
Margaret Mitchell
Dhruv Batra
C Lawrence Zitnick
Devi Parikh
dcterms:description: A benchmark dataset for Visual Question Answering (VQA) containing question-image pairs collected from Microsoft COCO dataset. It includes train, validation, and test sets with questions categorized into different types such as YES/NO, Number, and Others.
dcterms:title: VQA v2.0

dcterms:creator: Kushal Kafle
Christopher Kanan
dcterms:description: A dataset for Visual Question Answering (VQA) that addresses the bias problem in VQA v2.0 by collecting 1.6 million questions divided into 12 categories to ensure a diverse range of questions.
dcterms:title: TDIUC
